ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Items for a newb?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi :)  What level is your bard? If it is a lower level bard, I really liked my Obsidian Shard, which comes from Sol A and you should be able to get with you
ygData.messageBody:
Hi :) What level is your bard?
If it is a lower level bard, I really liked my Obsidian Shard, which comes
from Sol A and you should be able to get with you druid and another friend
or two (if I remember the sol a leveling structure correctly). Your druid
should also be able to start getting components for lambent armor as well,
which is really nice on lower/mid levels.


Halana 60 Shaman
Tani 55 Bardette
Solusek Ro
(I play this game too much)

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Thomas [mailto:Fuzhead@...]
> Sent: Friday, September 14, 2001 3:46 PM
> To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Items for a newb?
>
>
> I have a level 29 druid and i am gonna buy some stuff for my
> bard and i was
> wondering what kind of stuff should i get
> I think i was a 1 hs and a peircing weapon but not sure
> Also i might buy banded armor
> What is a good BP for me to get
> And is there any class specific armor that i should buy?
> Thanks for helping me out...
> Seoban
> -Vazaelle Server
>
